flawed_nl_solution:
The season is broken up into 22/2=<<22/2=11>>11 episode based on cost
The first 11 episodes cost 11*1000=$<<11*1000=11000>>11000
The next set of episodes cost 1000*1.2=$<<1000*1.2=1200>>1200 more per episode
So they cost 1000+1200=$<<1000+1200=2199>>2199 each
So in total they cost 2199*11=$<<2199*11=24189>>24189
So in total the season cost 24189+11000=$<<24189+11000=35189>>35189
#### 35189

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2200, not 2199. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
